function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited understanding of the impacts of covid-19 on the construction sector due to the novel and unexpected nature of the pandemic.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of availability for in-person interviews may affect the depth and quality of information gathered from interviewees.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Qualitative research methods used to study the impacts of covid-19 on construction projects","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergent coding used to identify themes and ideas within the data transcribed from interviews","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Categories of impacts not pre-defined by the research team","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of employment suspension and unemployment due to covid-19 on construction projects.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employment suspension and unemployment","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quarantine and restrictions","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Technical performance of workers","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Distribution and stock of materials","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public management","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulties of workers to mobilize to work","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Project stops and delays","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-economic family problems of workers","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear communication of data analysis results","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrecognized relationships between categorical variables","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inferential misuse of descriptive data analysis methods","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of profiles on the correspondence plot.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of relationship between variables due to observed distance not providing exact measure.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High inertia indicating greater distance between profiles, potentially leading to ineffective planning of infrastructures for disease prevention.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment due to close proximity and association among stakeholders.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of safety and health protocols in the construction industry","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 among construction workers due to lack of effective protocols","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in construction sector investment due to pandemic","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Job loss among construction workers during the pandemic","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study conducted during first wave of covid-19","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sample comes from a subset of chilean construction stakeholders","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in impact relationships due to covid-19","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex relationship among impact categories due to covid-19","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear cause and effect of impacts on construction projects due to covid-19","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of points among multiple stakeholders in the construction industry may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of covid-19 impacts on specific stakeholder categories in the construction industry.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconvenient distribution and stock of materials may disrupt the supply chain and increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconveniences in the distribution and stock of materials","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public management inconveniences related to quarantine and restrictions","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacts on construction projects due to covid-19","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High disruption to the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in impacts among multiple stakeholders","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of ppe due to supply chain issues","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic losses due to limited liquidity, delays in payments, and limited new projects","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of construction worker performance due to personnel reduction, hiring of less qualified workers, and limited supervision","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Project stops, delays, and productivity issues","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delays in delivery of materials due to pandemic","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workers unable to arrive at construction sites due to pandemic restrictions","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hiring less qualified workforce due to pandemic","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of financial support from the government for construction companies.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in finding qualified construction workers due to the pandemic.","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 impact on construction workers’ technical performance","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of safety protocols on construction sites","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in payments for the progress of works","category":"Unknown","confidence":"Medium"}]}
